entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is still holding onto Harry and seems to be in charge of the situation. ("Perhaps a pot of tea," said Fudge, who still hadn’t let go of Harry.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being held by Fudge and seems to be in an uncomfortable situation. (There was a loud scraping and puﬀing from behind them, and Stan and Ern appeared, carrying Harry’s trunk and Hedwig’s cage...)

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is a person who appears with Ern and seems to be excited about meeting Harry. (‘Ow come you di’n’t tell us ’oo you are, eh, Neville?’ said Stan, beaming at Harry...)

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is a person who appears with Stan and seems to be interested in meeting Harry. (‘Ow come you di’n’t tell us ’oo you are, eh, Neville?’ said Stan, beaming at Harry, while Ernie’s owlish face peered interestedly over Stan’s shoulder.)

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is a person who seems to be in charge of the parlor and is beckoning Fudge toward the passage. (‘Bye,’ Harry said miserably to Stan and Ern as Tom beckoned Fudge toward the passage that led from the bar.)

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is an animal who has a cage being carried by Stan and Ern. (There was a loud scraping and puﬀing from behind them, and Stan and Ern appeared, carrying Harry’s trunk and Hedwig’s cage...)

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a person who seems to be known by Fudge and Stan. (‘Ow come you di’n’t tell us ’oo you are, eh, Neville?’ said Stan...)

entities.name: bar
entities.description: The bar is a location where Harry and others seem to be coming from. (‘Bye,’ Harry said miserably to Stan and Ern as Tom beckoned Fudge toward the passage that led from the bar.)

entities.name: parlor
entities.description: The parlor is a location where Harry and others are being taken. (Fudge marched Harry along the narrow passage after Tom’s lantern, and then into a small parlor.)

relationships.description: Fudge is holding onto Harry. (‘Perhaps a pot of tea,’ said Fudge, who still hadn’t let go of Harry.)
Stan and Ern are accompanying each other as they appear with Harry’s trunk and Hedwig’s cage. (There was a loud scraping and puﬀing from behind them, and Stan and Ern appeared...)
Stan is meeting Harry for the first time. (‘Ow come you di’n’t tell us ’oo you are, eh, Neville?’ said Stan, beaming at Harry...)
Ernie is meeting Harry for the first time. (‘Ow come you di’n’t tell us ’oo you are, eh, Neville?’ said Stan, beaming at Harry, while Ernie’s owlish face peered interestedly over Stan’s shoulder.)
Tom is leading Fudge toward the passage. (‘Bye,’ Harry said miserably to Stan and Ern as Tom beckoned Fudge toward the passage that led from the bar.)
Tom is leading Harry into the parlor. (Fudge marched Harry along the narrow passage after Tom’s lantern, and then into a small parlor.)
